name: watchyourlan
description: WatchYourLAN is a self-hosted network scanner and device presence monitor. It detects new devices and shows hostnames, vendors, and activity in a sleek web UI.
features: Network scanning: Automatically discover all devices connected to your local network with periodic scans.
Device identification: Display hostnames, MAC addresses, IP addresses, and vendor information for each device.
New device alerts: Get notified immediately when unknown devices join your network for security monitoring.
Presence tracking: Monitor which devices are currently online or offline with real-time status updates.
Device history: View connection history showing when devices joined or left the network over time.
Custom naming: Assign friendly names and icons to devices for easier identification in the dashboard.
Grouping: Organize devices into categories like family, guests, IoT, or servers for better management.
MAC filtering: Whitelist or blacklist devices based on MAC addresses to control network access.
Notification channels: Send alerts via email, Telegram, Pushover, or webhooks when events occur.
Bandwidth monitoring: Track data usage per device to identify bandwidth hogs on your network.
Mobile responsive: Monitor your network from smartphones or tablets with an optimized mobile interface.
Export functionality: Generate reports or export device lists for documentation or network auditing purposes.
